name: Fuller
description: A worker who cleans and thickens woolen cloth; adventurers can purchase processed fabric, learn about textile finishing, or find evidence of industrial processes.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the earthy scent of wool and the sharp tang of cleaning chemicals. The sound of cloth being processed and the rhythmic work of finishing creates a methodical, industrious atmosphere. The air carries the promise of quality fabric and the essential nature of textile production.
